mapper.sql: select d.type,d.org_code,d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone,d.dept_url, d.email, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.org_type, d.dept_introduce from sys_dept d
mapper.select: select d.type,d.org_code,d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email,d.dept_url, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time, d.org_type, d.dept_introduce from sys_dept d where dept_id = #{deptId}
select count(1) from sys_user where dept_id = #{deptId} and del_flag = '0'
select count(1) from sys_dept where del_flag = '0' and parent_id = #{deptId} limit 1
select * from sys_dept where find_in_set(#{deptId}, ancestors)
select count(*) from sys_dept where status = 0 and del_flag = '0' and find_in_set(#{deptId}, ancestors)
where dept_name=#{deptName} and del_flag != '2' and parent_id = #{parentId} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into sys_dept( dept_id, parent_id, dept_name, ancestors, order_num, leader, phone, dept_url, email, status, create_by, org_code, type, org_type, dept_introduce, create_time )values( #{deptId}, #{parentId}, #{deptName}, #{ancestors}, #{orderNum}, #{leader}, #{phone}, #{deptUrl}, #{email}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{orgCode}, #{type}, #{orgType}, #{deptIntroduce}, sysdate() )
mapper.update:
update sys_dept
status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = sysdate()
where dept_id in (${ancestors})
mapper.delete: update sys_dept set del_flag = '2' where dept_id = #{deptId}
mapper.select: select d.type, d.org_code,d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_dept d where d.del_flag = '0' and d.org_code = #{orgCode}
SELECT DISTINCT org_code FROM `sys_dept` ORDER BY org_code DESC

select d.type, d.org_code,d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_dept d where d.del_flag = '0' and d.org_code = #{orgCode} and d.type != '1'

select d.type, d.org_code,d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_dept d where d.del_flag = '0' and d.org_code = #{orgCode} and d.type != '1' and d.status = '0'

select d.type, d.org_code,d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_dept d where d.del_flag = '0' and d.org_code = #{orgCode} and d.type = '1'

select d.type, d.org_code,d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_dept d where d.del_flag = '0' and d.type = '1' and status = '0'

select DISTINCT d.type, d.org_code,d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_dept d,sys_user u,sys_user_post up,sys_post po where d.del_flag = '0' and d.status = '0' AND d.org_code = u.org_code AND u.user_id = up.user_id AND up.post_id=po.post_id AND po.post_code=#{post} AND d.org_code = #{orgCode} order by d.parent_id, d.order_num

select d.type, d.org_code,d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_dept d where d.del_flag = '0' and d.org_code = #{orgCode} and d.type = '2'

select d.type, d.org_code,d.dept_id, d.parent_id, d.ancestors, d.dept_name, d.order_num, d.leader, d.phone, d.email, d.status, d.del_flag, d.create_by, d.create_time from sys_dept d where d.del_flag = '0' and d.type = '2'
